topComments.author: osigbeme donaldson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) No in√≠cio houve alguns problemas administrativos com o dinheiro devido na chegada. Mas depois de alguns telefonemas eles foram muito atenciosos. Eles at√© ajustaram as refei√ß√µes para se adequarem √† minha dieta com baixo teor de s√≥dio.  (Original) At first there were some administrative issues with the money owed on arrival. But after some phone calls they were very accommodating. Our reception dinner, wedding, and subsequent stay for the honeymoon was amazing. They really went the extra mile to make us happy. They even adjusted the meals to fit my low sodium diet.

topComments.author: Veronica P
topComments.comment: Its a nice hotel (the best/only option in the area), with a couple of pools, a view of the marina, a casino, and a few different restaurants. It almost makes you feel as if you are on a cruise (except not all inclusive üôÇ). I just wish the restaurants had better food.  The beach is not walking distance from the hotel, but once there, you get free chairs/umbrellas and the hotel has a couple of food trucks where you can order food and cocktails.

topComments.author: Alan Freudenstein
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s n√£o sab√≠amos que o Beach Club para o resort seria fechado durante a nossa estadia para que pudesse acomodar um grupo de h√≥spedes do cruzeiro Virgin. N√£o houve aviso na chegada e nenhum aviso no site do Hilton ou na reserva. Reservamos e pagamos por um quarto no andar do clube, mas o "clube executivo" est√° fechado h√° anos, ent√£o o Hilton est√° vendendo algo que n√£o existe. As op√ß√µes de restaurante no Resorts World s√£o muito limitadas, mas a comida e o servi√ßo do Tides, que estava aberto, era melhor do que t√≠nhamos previsto. O hotel precisa colocar as coisas em ordem, por exemplo. um dos tr√™s elevadores principais estava fora, n√£o havia porta do chuveiro para o nosso quarto, as 4 banheiras de hidromassagem na piscina da cobertura n√£o estavam operacionais.  (Original) We did not know that the Beach Club for the resort would be closed during our stay so that it could accommodate a group of Virgin cruise guests. There was no warning upon arrival and no notice on the Hilton website or upon booking. We booked and paid for a room on the club floor but the "executive club" has been closed for years so Hilton is selling something that doesn't exist. The restaurant choices at Resorts World are very limited but the food and service for Tides which was open was better then we had anticipated. The hotel needs to bring things up to working order e.g. one of three main elevators was out, there was no shower door for our room, the 4 hot tubs at the rooftop pool were not operational.

topComments.author: Taylor Reidel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Acabei de voltar de uma viagem aqui e me senti compelido a dar meu feedback. Vou come√ßar com o bom - nosso quarto era muito bom, t√≠nhamos uma su√≠te de 2 quartos que sa√≠a para a piscina e se conectava a outro quarto. Os quartos eram muito limpos e o servi√ßo de limpeza veio diariamente e fez um √≥timo trabalho limpando os quartos. O clube de praia √© muito bom e andar de carrinho de golfe pela ilha foi divertido. Agora, para o mal, eles abrem e fecham tudo como quiserem. Eles fecham o cassino enquanto voc√™ est√° no meio do jogo e o expulsam, mesmo que eles estejam abertos at√© as 2 da manh√£. Eles fecham o cassino durante o dia e n√£o abrem at√© as 6, quando o tempo est√° ruim e n√£o h√° literalmente mais nada a fazer. N√£o h√° nada a fazer al√©m do cassino e da piscina/praia. A piscina do resort n√£o √© agrad√°vel e muito pequena. Todas as lojas est√£o fechadas na vila dos pescadores. H√° apenas 2 restaurantes abertos em todo o resort. A comida √© m√©dia. A pizza √© horr√≠vel. Parece que quase todos no resort n√£o se importam com voc√™. Toneladas de disjuntores de primavera estavam l√° e levaram todas as cadeiras da nossa varanda, ent√£o n√£o t√≠nhamos onde sentar, mesmo depois de gastar o dinheiro adicional em um quarto que d√° para a piscina. Deitamos no ch√£o para nos bronzear. Foi literalmente congelado fora do cassino uma noite e ningu√©m realmente se importou em fazer nada. N√≥s vamos a Nassau pelo menos 2x por ano e estamos acostumados a ficar no The Cove Atlantis & Rosewood Baha Mar, isso n√£o √© nada como esses resorts, ent√£o se voc√™ est√° acostumado a f√©rias de luxo onde as pessoas se preocupam com voc√™ estar l√° e h√° coisas para fazer , fique longe daqui. Esta foi a nossa primeira e √∫ltima viagem.  (Original) Just got back from a trip here and felt compelled to give my feedback. I‚Äôll start with the good- our room was very nice, we had a 2bd suite that walked out to the pool and connected to another room. The rooms were very clean and the cleaning service came daily and did a great job cleaning the rooms. The beach club is very nice and riding the golf cart around the island was fun. Now for the bad- they open and close everything as they please. They shut the casino down on you while you are in the middle of playing and kick you out even though they are supposed to be open until 2am. They have the casino closed during the day & don‚Äôt open until 6 when the weather is bad and there is literally nothing else to do. There is nothing to do other than the casino & the pool/beach. The pool at the resort is not nice and really small. All the shops are closed down at fisherman‚Äôs village. There‚Äôs only 2 restaurants that are open at the whole resort. The food is average. Pizza is horrible. Seems like almost everyone at the resort does not care about you. Tons of spring breakers were there and took all the chairs from our porch so we had nowhere to sit, even after spending the additional money on a room that walks out to the pool. We laid on the ground to tan. Got literally frozen out of the casino one night and nobody really cared to do anything. We go to Nassau at least 2x per year and are used to staying at The Cove Atlantis & Rosewood Baha Mar, this is nothing like these resorts so if you are used to luxury vacations where people care about you being there and there are things to do, stay away from here. This was our first and last trip.
